deploy.startCommand: python manage.py migrate --noinput && python -c "from django.contrib.auth.models import User; from spk.models import UserProfile; User.objects.create_superuser('admin', 'admin@example.com', 'admin123')" && python -c "from django.contrib.auth.models import User; from spk.models import UserProfile; [UserProfile.objects.get_or_create(user=u) for u in User.objects.all()]" && gunicorn spk_maza.wsgi:application --bind 0.0.0.0:$PORT
